thread.title: Florence Kellett

author: Florence Kellett
title: Florence Kellett
text:
My experience with TrustedHousesitters over many years is that it is a very professional organisation. They regularly review their management strategies and deliver up-to-date information to their members. I have found their response to my request for help with any particular issue is always polite and helpful.
I would, and often have, recommended TrustedHousesitters to anyone who has expressed an interest in housesitting or finding a housesitter.
